welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Thief River Falls, the charming city known for its beautiful landscapes and friendly community. We invite you to explore and embrace all that this wonderful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Thief River Falls Regional Airport serves all commercial flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Thief River Falls Regional Airport serves private and chartered flights and provides services for pilots and passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport houses all of the necessary facilities for passengers, including check-in counters, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is a smaller terminal used for domestic flights and is accessible via a short walk from the main terminal.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free wifi network after accepting the terms and conditions.
